amendment.description: An amendment in the nature of a substitute made in order pursuant to the provisions of H. Res. 392, consisting of the text of H.R. 3160, as modified by the amendment specified in part 1 of House Report 104-501.

action.text: Amendment (A001) in the nature of a substitute offered by the Committee on Rules.
Rules amendment (A001) modified by unanimous consent.
Pursuant to the provisions of H. Res. 392, the amendment in the nature of a substitute consisting of the text of H.R. 3160, as modified, was considered to have been adopted.
